nodes.text: The Fireball Belch was a pyrokinetic Force power utilized by the Gamorreans Thok and Gorc. They spit out a fireball from their mouth that was hot enough to scorch a Durasteel hull. Their first demonstration of the ability occurred by accident when he and Gorc, after having an immense brunch and downing a barrel of Gamorrean hooch, burned their clan-rival Scumbo in the snout while doing a bro-fist. Thok would later use it to great effect while acting as a student of Teräs Käsi under the teachings of Emperor's Hand Arden Lyn.

The Fireball Belch was one of Thok's moves in the fighting game Star Wars: Masters of Teras Kasi. Although the game itself was canon due to introducing characters as Arden Lyn, the move's status as either canon or simply gameplay mechanics was debated until the release of Part 2 of Barely Tolerable: Alien Henchmen of the Empire, which confirmed the ability as canonical.
